Name: Angel Ring (Hero)
Description: If you die from an attack and have more than 1 HP, you are left with 1 HP. Functions once.

Name: Angel Ring (Epic)
Description: If you die from an attack and have more than 1 HP, you are left with 1 HP. Functions once per combat

Name: Angel Ring (Legend)
Description: If you die from an attack and have more than 1 HP, you are left with 1 HP. Functions once per engagement.
